com.africanbongo.clearskyes.util

Class BackgroundTaskUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.africanbongo.clearskyes.util.BackgroundTaskUtil

  • public final class BackgroundTaskUtil
extends java.lang.Object

    Static class that allows background work to be done, then consume the result using BackgroundTaskUtil.Callback when the task has been finished.

    All background tasks are run using the Executor framework.

    UI tasks are run using the Handler class.

    Inspired by EpicPandaForce

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BackgroundTaskUtil.Callback<R>
      An interface used to assimilate results of background processes

    • Method Detail

      • runAndUpdateUI

        public static <R> void runAndUpdateUI(java.util.concurrent.Callable<R> backgroundTask,
                                      BackgroundTaskUtil.Callback<R> uiTask)
        Runs a task on a background thread and the result is consumed in the BackgroundTaskUtil.Callback argument
        Type Parameters:
        R - The Object type passed as a consumable object
        Parameters:
        backgroundTask - Callable used to run background task and return the result
        uiTask - BackgroundTaskUtil.Callback that consumes the result of the background task, it is run on the application's main Looper.

      • runTask

        public static void runTask(java.lang.Runnable task)

        Executes a runnable task within an ExecutorService using a cached thread pool. Do not run task that includes UI changes otherwise app crashes.

        If the need arises to execute UI Tasks asynchronously use runAndUpdateUI(Callable, Callback)

        Parameters:
        task -
